reviewText: Even better than Agenda One, this masterpiece will inspire Christian patriots throughout America and beyond to keep fighting for the liberties won for us by our forebearers.  Satan is served notice:  your deceit is being exposed and resisted!

I was skeptical after hearing about this documentary. Seemed like it could be just another slanted hit piece. However, I saw it for free on my Amazon Prime Streaming TV account, so I went ahead and watched it I thought I might get 10-15 minutes in and then bail out, but this was SO compelling that I was riveted and ended up watching it all. This is one of the most enlightening works I've sat through in a while. It provokes a great deal of examination and it backs up its statements with historical facts and documentation to support it.

There is a creepy virus that is pressing its way through out society and this documentary exposes it very effectively. Well worth watching, I highly recommend everyone should view, regardless of ideology.

I have been deceived for much, much too long.  God forgive me for my willful participation in the propagation of this deceit.  I wish to stand up for Truth. Remake me in the image you had in mind when you created me.  Build inside of me the character that resembles and reflects your likeness. Give me the courage to stand firm in the face of this stronghold that sets itself up against You and Your Truth, namely Jesus Himself and His purpose for dying for my sins.  God thank You for this film and this film maker.  I do pray that you save the nation of the United States of America, and please do allow us the gift of repentance from our sinful ways. Please do help us to humble ourselves and pray and seek Your face and turn from our wicked ways, and please do hear from heaven, and please do forgive our sin and heal our land. May Your will be done.  Amen

I watched both Agenda and Agenda 2.  The best information comes from those interviewed in each of these documentaries.  They discuss the deception, disinformation, and manipulation of society by government and corporate interests.  However where this fails is its conclusion of who's behind it and what the solution is.  Mr. Bowers claims that a return to Christian values and the traditional Republican Party of the Reagan Era will fix things.  Well it won't.  Scapegoat labels like Liberal, Progressive, Far-left, Communist offer convenient bad guys for those responsible.  But it's the good cop, bad cop interplay between and across both Democratic and Republican administrations over the decades that have gotten us into the state that were in today.  It's the establishment that produces the candidates and the policies and the long-agenda which is to blame.  And unfortunately Mr. Bowers is just kicking the same ole bucket further down the road by cozying up to and being promoted from within by that same establishment.  In summary, Agenda and Agenda 2 are akin to a football team that successfully covers 99 yards but then fails to score by describing the problem well but then asserting exactly the wrong action plan ad the remedy in its conclusion.
It was interesting in the sense that some of the arguments were so stupid that I hadn't heard them before and was genuinely surprised someone would make arguments so stupid.

Hard to argue against the many connections between the liberal, socialist and communist parties. Throughout history and today all countries ruled by tyrants are either socialist or communist. There has never been a Kim Jong  Un, Hilter or Stalin type ruler with republican views. Liberals try hard to connect the Nazi party with republicans which is comical since the Nazi party means " Nationalist Socialist German Workers' Party". Key word being "Socialist". Truth is the Nazi party and David Duke types are TRYING to connect with the republican party because they have drank the mainstream media hype that all republicans are racist. Just shows their ignorance. Anyway, excellent show just like the first one. Keep up the good fight Curtis. TY.

But they have been trained to be incompetent, dependent. The result is depression; anxiety; drug dependence, domestic abuse and poverty.

Bwahahahahaa!!!! I feel sorry for these people. Seriously - why are you "conservatives" so afraid of walking out your own front door? Of your neighbors? Of your children's teachers? I don't consider you my enemies, but you would consider me yours. So full of hate and fear. I just feel sorry for you. Then, I laugh at you because you are dumb enough to be taken in by fear mongering movie makers like this huckster. One of the first scenes, this guy talks about how the left "rules via fear", then with zero irony, launches in to a two hour fear-laced tirade against imagined threats and enemies. People on the right. Please. Open a book, and not one by Rush Limbaugh or Bill O'Reilly. Turn off Fox News on both the tv and the radio. In fact, why don't you unplug from the media altogether for a while. Maybe read the constitution. You are clearly very confused about how the government works.
